097/**
098 * The Class {@link VmAccess}. The component supports the following
099 * configuration properties:
100 * 
101 *   * `displayResource`: a map with the following entries:
102 *       - `preferredIpVersion`: `ipv4` or `ipv6` (default: `ipv4`).
103 *         Determines the IP addresses uses in the generated
104 *         connection file.
105 *   * `deleteConnectionFile`: `true` or `false` (default: `true`).
106 *     If `true`, the downloaded connection file will be deleted by
107 *     the remote viewer when opened.
108 *   * `syncPreviewsFor`: a list objects with either property `user` or
109 *     `role` and the associated name (default: `[]`).
110 *     The remote viewer will synchronize the previews for the specified
111 *     users and roles.
112 *
113 */
114@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.ExcessiveImports",
115    "PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects", "PMD.GodClass", "PMD.TooManyMethods",
116    "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity" })
117public class VmAccess extends FreeMarkerConlet<VmAccess.ResourceModel> {
118
119    private static final String VM_NAME_PROPERTY = "vmName";
120    private static final String RENDERED
121        = VmAccess.class.getName() + ".rendered";
122    private static final String PENDING
123        = VmAccess.class.getName() + ".pending";
124    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
125        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.Edit);
126    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES_FOR_GENERATED = RenderMode.asSet(
127        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.StickyPreview);
128    private EventPipeline appPipeline;
129    private static ObjectMapper objectMapper
130        = new ObjectMapper().registerModule(new JavaTimeModule());
131    private Class<?> preferredIpVersion = Inet4Address.class;
132    private Set<String> syncUsers = Collections.emptySet();
133    private Set<String> syncRoles = Collections.emptySet();
134    private boolean deleteConnectionFile = true;
135
136    /**
137     * The periodically generated update event.
138     */
139    public static class Update extends Event<Void> {
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
144     * 
145     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
146     * on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
147     * sends the event to
148     */
149    public VmAccess(Channel componentChannel) {
150        super(componentChannel);
151    }
152
153    /**
154     * On start.
155     *
156     * @param event the event
157     */
158    @Handler
159    public void onStart(Start event) {
160        appPipeline = event.processedBy().get();
161    }
162
163    /**
164     * Configure the component. 
165     * 
166     * @param event the event
167     */
168    @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
169    @Handler
170    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
171        event.structured(componentPath())
172            .or(() -> {
173                var oldConfig = event.structured("/Manager/GuiHttpServer"
174                    + "/ConsoleWeblet/WebConsole/ComponentCollector/VmViewer");
175                if (oldConfig.isPresent()) {
176                    logger.warning(() -> "Using configuration with old "
177                        + "component name \"VmViewer\", please update to "
178                        + "\"VmAccess\"");
179                }
180                return oldConfig;
181            })
182            .ifPresent(c -> {
183                try {
184                    var dispRes = (Map<String, Object>) c
185                        .getOrDefault("displayResource",
186                            Collections.emptyMap());
187                    switch ((String) dispRes.getOrDefault("preferredIpVersion",
188                        "")) {
189                    case "ipv6":
190                        preferredIpVersion = Inet6Address.class;
191                        break;
192                    case "ipv4":
193                    default:
194                        preferredIpVersion = Inet4Address.class;
195                        break;
196                    }
197
198                    // Delete connection file
199                    deleteConnectionFile
200                        = Optional.ofNullable(c.get("deleteConnectionFile"))
201                            .filter(v -> v instanceof String)
202                            .map(v -> (String) v)
203                            .map(Boolean::parseBoolean).orElse(true);
204
205                    // Users or roles for which previews should be synchronized
206                    syncUsers = ((List<Map<String, String>>) c.getOrDefault(
207                        "syncPreviewsFor", Collections.emptyList())).stream()
208                            .map(m -> m.get("user"))
209                            .filter(s -> s != null).collect(Collectors.toSet());
210                    logger.finest(() -> "Syncing previews for users: "
211                        + syncUsers.toString());
212                    syncRoles = ((List<Map<String, String>>) c.getOrDefault(
213                        "syncPreviewsFor", Collections.emptyList())).stream()
214                            .map(m -> m.get("role"))
215                            .filter(s -> s != null).collect(Collectors.toSet());
216                    logger.finest(() -> "Syncing previews for roles: "
217                        + syncRoles.toString());
218                } catch (ClassCastException e) {
219                    logger.config("Malformed configuration: " + e.getMessage());
220                }
221            });
222    }
223
224    private boolean syncPreviews(Session session) {
225        return WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
226            .filter(u -> syncUsers.contains(u.getName())).isPresent()
227            || WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
228                .filter(cr -> syncRoles.contains(cr.getName())).findAny()
229                .isPresent();
230    }
231
232    /**
233     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
234     *
235     * @param event the event
236     * @param channel the channel
237     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
238     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
239     *             exception
240     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
241     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
242     */
243    @Handler
244    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleConnection channel)
245            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
246            ParseException, IOException {
247        // Add conlet resources to page
248        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
249            .setDisplayNames(
250                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
251            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview)
252            .addScript(new ScriptResource().setScriptType("module")
253                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
254                    type(), "VmAccess-functions.js"))));
255        channel.session().put(RENDERED, new HashSet<>());
256    }
257
258    /**
259     * On console configured.
260     *
261     * @param event the event
262     * @param connection the console connection
263     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
264     */
265    @Handler
266    public void onConsoleConfigured(ConsoleConfigured event,
267            ConsoleConnection connection) throws InterruptedException,
268            IOException {
269        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
270        final var rendered
271            = (Set<ResourceModel>) connection.session().get(RENDERED);
272        connection.session().remove(RENDERED);
273        if (!syncPreviews(connection.session())) {
274            return;
275        }
276        addMissingConlets(event, connection, rendered);
277    }
278
279    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops",
280        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
281    private void addMissingConlets(ConsoleConfigured event,
282            ConsoleConnection connection, final Set<ResourceModel> rendered)
283            throws InterruptedException {
284        boolean foundMissing = false;
285        var session = connection.session();
286        for (var vmName : appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().accessibleFor(
287            WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
288                .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
289            WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
290                .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
291            .get().stream().map(d -> d.definition().name()).toList()) {
292            if (rendered.stream()
293                .anyMatch(r -> r.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM
294                    && r.name().equals(vmName))) {
295                continue;
296            }
297            if (!foundMissing) {
298                // Suspending to allow rendering of conlets to be noticed
299                var failSafe = Components.schedule(t -> event.resumeHandling(),
300                    Duration.ofSeconds(1));
301                event.suspendHandling(failSafe::cancel);
302                connection.setAssociated(PENDING, event);
303                foundMissing = true;
304            }
305            fire(new AddConletRequest(event.event().event().renderSupport(),
306                VmAccess.class.getName(),
307                RenderMode.asSet(RenderMode.Preview))
308                    .addProperty(VM_NAME_PROPERTY, vmName),
309                connection);
310        }
311    }
312
313    /**
314     * On console prepared.
315     *
316     * @param event the event
317     * @param connection the connection
318     */
319    @Handler
320    public void onConsolePrepared(ConsolePrepared event,
321            ConsoleConnection connection) {
322        if (syncPreviews(connection.session())) {
323            connection.respond(new UpdateConletType(type()));
324        }
325    }
326
327    private String storagePath(Session session, String conletId) {
328        return "/" + WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
329            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("")
330            + "/" + VmAccess.class.getName() + "/" + conletId;
331    }
332
333    @Override
334    protected Optional<ResourceModel> createNewState(AddConletRequest event,
335            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
336        var model = new ResourceModel(conletId);
337        model.setMode(ResourceModel.Mode.VM);
338        model
339            .setName((String) event.properties().get(VM_NAME_PROPERTY));
340        String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
341        connection.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
342            storagePath(connection.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
343        return Optional.of(model);
344    }
345
346    @Override
347    protected Optional<ResourceModel> createStateRepresentation(Event<?> event,
348            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
349        var model = new ResourceModel(conletId);
350        String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
351        connection.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
352            storagePath(connection.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
353        return Optional.of(model);
354    }
355
356    @Override
357    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.EmptyCatchBlock")
358    protected Optional<ResourceModel> recreateState(Event<?> event,
359            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId) throws Exception {
360        KeyValueStoreQuery query = new KeyValueStoreQuery(
361            storagePath(channel.session(), conletId), channel);
362        newEventPipeline().fire(query, channel);
363        try {
364            if (!query.results().isEmpty()) {
365                var json = query.results().get(0).values().stream().findFirst()
366                    .get();
367                ResourceModel model
368                    = objectMapper.readValue(json, ResourceModel.class);
369                return Optional.of(model);
370            }
371        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
372            // Means we have no result.
373        }
374
375        // Fall back to creating default state.
376        return createStateRepresentation(event, channel, conletId);
377    }
378
379    @Override
380    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
381    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
382            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, ResourceModel model)
383            throws Exception {
384        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
385            return renderPreview(event, channel, conletId, model);
386        }
387
388        // Render edit
389        ResourceBundle resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
390        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = EnumSet.noneOf(RenderMode.class);
391        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Edit)) {
392            var session = channel.session();
393            var vmNames = appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().accessibleFor(
394                WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
395                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
396                WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
397                    .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
398                .get().stream().map(d -> d.definition().name()).sorted()
399                .toList();
400            var poolNames = appPipeline.fire(new GetPools().accessibleFor(
401                WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
402                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
403                WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
404                    .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
405                .get().stream().map(VmPool::name).sorted().toList();
406            Template tpl
407                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmAccess-edit.ftl.html");
408            var fmModel = fmModel(event, channel, conletId, model);
409            fmModel.put("vmNames", vmNames);
410            fmModel.put("poolNames", poolNames);
411            channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), conletId,
412                processTemplate(event, tpl, fmModel))
413                    .addOption("cancelable", true)
414                    .addOption("okayLabel",
415                        resourceBundle.getString("okayLabel")));
416        }
417        return renderedAs;
418    }
419
420    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
421    private Set<RenderMode> renderPreview(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
422            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, ResourceModel model)
423            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
424            ParseException, IOException, InterruptedException {
425        channel.associated(PENDING, Event.class)
426            .ifPresent(e -> {
427                e.resumeHandling();
428                channel.setAssociated(PENDING, null);
429            });
430
431        var session = channel.session();
432        if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM && model.name() != null) {
433            // Remove conlet if VM definition has been removed
434            // or user has not at least one permission
435            Optional<VmData> vmData = appPipeline.fire(new GetVms()
436                .withName(model.name()).accessibleFor(
437                    WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
438                        .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
439                    WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
440                        .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
441                .get().stream().findFirst();
442            if (vmData.isEmpty()) {
443                channel.respond(
444                    new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
445                return Collections.emptySet();
446            }
447        }
448
449        if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.POOL && model.name() != null) {
450            // Remove conlet if pool definition has been removed
451            // or user has not at least one permission
452            VmPool pool = appPipeline
453                .fire(new GetPools().withName(model.name())).get()
454                .stream().findFirst().orElse(null);
455            if (pool == null
456                || poolPermissions(pool, channel.session()).isEmpty()) {
457                channel.respond(
458                    new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
459                return Collections.emptySet();
460            }
461        }
462
463        // Render
464        Template tpl
465            = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmAccess-preview.ftl.html");
466        channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
467            processTemplate(event, tpl,
468                fmModel(event, channel, conletId, model)))
469                    .setRenderAs(
470                        RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
471                    .setSupportedModes(syncPreviews(channel.session())
472                        ? MODES_FOR_GENERATED
473                        : MODES));
474        if (!Strings.isNullOrEmpty(model.name())) {
475            Optional.ofNullable(channel.session().get(RENDERED))
476                .ifPresent(s -> ((Set<ResourceModel>) s).add(model));
477            updateConfig(channel, model);
478        }
479        return EnumSet.of(RenderMode.Preview);
480    }
481
482    private Set<Permission> vmPermissions(VmDefinition vmDef,
483            Session session) {
484        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
485            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
486        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session)
487            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
488        return vmDef.permissionsFor(user, roles);
489    }
490
491    private Set<Permission> poolPermissions(VmPool pool,
492            Session session) {
493        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
494            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
495        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session)
496            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
497        return pool.permissionsFor(user, roles);
498    }
499
500    private void updateConfig(ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model)
501            throws InterruptedException {
502        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
503            model.getConletId(), "updateConfig", model.mode(), model.name()));
504        updateVmDef(channel, model);
505    }
506
507    private void updateVmDef(ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model)
508            throws InterruptedException {
509        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(model.name())) {
510            return;
511        }
512        appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().withName(model.name())).get().stream()
513            .findFirst().map(d -> d.definition()).ifPresent(vmDef -> {
514                try {
515                    var data = Map.of("metadata",
516                        Map.of("namespace", vmDef.namespace(),
517                            "name", vmDef.name()),
518                        "spec", vmDef.spec(),
519                        "status", vmDef.getStatus(),
520                        "userPermissions",
521                        vmPermissions(vmDef, channel.session()).stream()
522                            .map(VmDefinition.Permission::toString).toList());
523                    channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
524                        model.getConletId(), "updateVmDefinition", data));
525                } catch (JsonSyntaxException e) {
526                    logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
527                        () -> "Failed to serialize VM definition");
528                }
529            });
530    }
531
532    @Override
533    protected void doConletDeleted(ConletDeleted event,
534            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId,
535            ResourceModel conletState)
536            throws Exception {
537        if (event.renderModes().isEmpty()) {
538            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().delete(
539                storagePath(channel.session(), conletId)));
540        }
541    }
542
543    /**
544     * Track the VM definitions.
545     *
546     * @param event the event
547     * @param channel the channel
548     * @throws IOException 
549     * @throws InterruptedException 
550     */
551    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
552    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ConfusingTernary", "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
553        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
554        "PMD.ConfusingArgumentToVarargsMethod" })
555    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
556            throws IOException, InterruptedException {
557        var vmDef = event.vmDefinition();
558
559        // Update known conlets
560        for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
561            var connection = entry.getKey();
562            for (var conletId : entry.getValue()) {
563                var model = stateFromSession(connection.session(), conletId);
564                if (model.isEmpty()
565                    || model.get().mode() != ResourceModel.Mode.VM
566                    || !Objects.areEqual(model.get().name(), vmDef.name())) {
567                    continue;
568                }
569                if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED
570                    || vmPermissions(vmDef, connection.session()).isEmpty()) {
571                    connection.respond(
572                        new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
573                } else {
574                    updateVmDef(connection, model.get());
575                }
576            }
577        }
578    }
579
580    /**
581     * On vm pool changed.
582     *
583     * @param event the event
584     * @param channel the channel
585     */
586    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
587    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
588    public void onVmPoolChanged(VmPoolChanged event) {
589        var poolName = event.vmPool().name();
590        // Update known conlets
591        for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
592            var connection = entry.getKey();
593            for (var conletId : entry.getValue()) {
594                var model = stateFromSession(connection.session(), conletId);
595                if (model.isEmpty()
596                    || model.get().mode() != ResourceModel.Mode.POOL
597                    || !Objects.areEqual(model.get().name(), poolName)) {
598                    continue;
599                }
600                if (event.deleted()
601                    || poolPermissions(event.vmPool(), connection.session())
602                        .isEmpty()) {
603                    connection.respond(
604                        new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
605                }
606            }
607        }
608    }
609
610    @Override
611    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidDecimalLiteralsInBigDecimalConstructor",
612        "PMD.ConfusingArgumentToVarargsMethod", "PMD.NcssCount",
613        "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition" })
614    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
615            ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model)
616            throws Exception {
617        event.stop();
618        if ("selectedResource".equals(event.method())) {
619            selectResource(event, channel, model);
620            return;
621        }
622
623        // Handle command for selected VM
624        var vmData = appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().withName(model.name())).get()
625            .stream().findFirst();
626        if (vmData.isEmpty()) {
627            return;
628        }
629        var vmChannel = vmData.get().channel();
630        var vmDef = vmData.get().definition();
631        var vmName = vmDef.metadata().getName();
632        var perms = vmPermissions(vmDef, channel.session());
633        var resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
634        switch (event.method()) {
635        case "start":
636            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.START)) {
637                fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Running", vmChannel));
638            }
639            break;
640        case "stop":
641            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.STOP)) {
642                fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Stopped", vmChannel));
643            }
644            break;
645        case "reset":
646            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.RESET)) {
647                confirmReset(event, channel, model, resourceBundle);
648            }
649            break;
650        case "resetConfirmed":
651            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.RESET)) {
652                fire(new ResetVm(vmName), vmChannel);
653            }
654            break;
655        case "openConsole":
656            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.ACCESS_CONSOLE)) {
657                var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(channel.session())
658                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("");
659                var pwQuery
660                    = Event.onCompletion(new GetDisplayPassword(vmDef, user),
661                        e -> openConsole(vmName, channel, model,
662                            e.password().orElse(null)));
663                fire(pwQuery, vmChannel);
664            }
665            break;
666        default:// ignore
667            break;
668        }
669    }
670
671    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition",
672        "PMD.UseLocaleWithCaseConversions" })
673    private void selectResource(NotifyConletModel event,
674            ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model)
675            throws JsonProcessingException, InterruptedException {
676        try {
677            model.setMode(ResourceModel.Mode
678                .valueOf(event.<String> param(0).toUpperCase()));
679            model.setName(event.param(1));
680            String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
681            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(storagePath(
682                channel.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
683            updateConfig(channel, model);
684        } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
685            logger.warning(() -> "Invalid resource type: " + e.getMessage());
686        }
687    }
688
689    private void openConsole(String vmName, ConsoleConnection connection,
690            ResourceModel model, String password) {
691        VmDefinition vmDef;
692        try {
693            vmDef = appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().withName(model.name())).get()
694                .stream().findFirst().map(VmData::definition).orElse(null);
695        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
696            return;
697        }
698        if (vmDef == null) {
699            return;
700        }
701        var addr = displayIp(vmDef);
702        if (addr.isEmpty()) {
703            logger.severe(() -> "Failed to find display IP for " + vmName);
704            return;
705        }
706        var port = vmDef.<Number> fromVm("display", "spice", "port")
707            .map(Number::longValue);
708        if (port.isEmpty()) {
709            logger.severe(() -> "No port defined for display of " + vmName);
710            return;
711        }
712        StringBuffer data = new StringBuffer(100)
713            .append("[virt-viewer]\ntype=spice\nhost=")
714            .append(addr.get().getHostAddress()).append("\nport=")
715            .append(port.get().toString())
716            .append('\n');
717        if (password != null) {
718            data.append("password=").append(password).append('\n');
719        }
720        vmDef.<String> fromVm("display", "spice", "proxyUrl")
721            .ifPresent(u -> {
722                if (!Strings.isNullOrEmpty(u)) {
723                    data.append("proxy=").append(u).append('\n');
724                }
725            });
726        if (deleteConnectionFile) {
727            data.append("delete-this-file=1\n");
728        }
729        connection.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
730            model.getConletId(), "openConsole", "application/x-virt-viewer",
731            Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(data.toString().getBytes())));
732    }
733
734    private Optional<InetAddress> displayIp(VmDefinition vmDef) {
735        Optional<String> server = vmDef.fromVm("display", "spice", "server");
736        if (server.isPresent()) {
737            var srv = server.get();
738            try {
739                var addr = InetAddress.getByName(srv);
740                logger.fine(() -> "Using IP address from CRD for "
741                    + vmDef.getMetadata().getName() + ": " + addr);
742                return Optional.of(addr);
743            } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
744                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e, () -> "Invalid server address "
745                    + srv + ": " + e.getMessage());
746                return Optional.empty();
747            }
748        }
749        var addrs = Optional.<List<String>> ofNullable(vmDef
750            .extra("nodeAddresses")).orElse(Collections.emptyList()).stream()
751            .map(a -> {
752                try {
753                    return InetAddress.getByName(a);
754                } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
755                    logger.warning(() -> "Invalid IP address: " + a);
756                    return null;
757                }
758            }).filter(a -> a != null).toList();
759        logger.fine(() -> "Known IP addresses for "
760            + vmDef.name() + ": " + addrs);
761        return addrs.stream()
762            .filter(a -> preferredIpVersion.isAssignableFrom(a.getClass()))
763            .findFirst().or(() -> addrs.stream().findFirst());
764    }
765
766    private void confirmReset(NotifyConletModel event,
767            ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model,
768            ResourceBundle resourceBundle) throws TemplateNotFoundException,
769            MalformedTemplateNameException, ParseException, IOException {
770        Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
771            .getTemplate("VmAccess-confirmReset.ftl.html");
772        channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), model.getConletId(),
773            processTemplate(event, tpl,
774                fmModel(event, channel, model.getConletId(), model)))
775                    .addOption("cancelable", true).addOption("closeLabel", "")
776                    .addOption("title",
777                        resourceBundle.getString("confirmResetTitle")));
778    }
779
780    @Override
781    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleConnection channel,
782            String conletId) throws Exception {
783        return true;
784    }
785
786    /**
787     * The Class AccessModel.
788     */
789    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
790    public static class ResourceModel extends ConletBaseModel {
791
792        /**
793         * The Enum ResourceType.
794         */
795        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
796        public enum Mode {
797            VM, POOL
798        }
799
800        private Mode mode;
801        private String name;
802
803        /**
804         * Instantiates a new resource model.
805         *
806         * @param conletId the conlet id
807         */
808        public ResourceModel(@JsonProperty("conletId") String conletId) {
809            super(conletId);
810        }
811
812        /**
813         * Gets the resource name.
814         *
815         * @return the string
816         */
817        @JsonGetter("name")
818        public String name() {
819            return name;
820        }
821
822        /**
823         * Sets the name.
824         *
825         * @param name the resource name to set
826         */
827        public void setName(String name) {
828            this.name = name;
829        }
830
831        /**
832         * Returns the mode.
833         *
834         * @return the resourceType
835         */
836        @JsonGetter("mode")
837        public Mode mode() {
838            return mode;
839        }
840
841        /**
842         * Sets the mode.
843         *
844         * @param mode the resource mode to set
845         */
846        public void setMode(Mode mode) {
847            this.mode = mode;
848        }
849
850        @Override
851        public int hashCode() {
852            final int prime = 31;
853            int result = super.hashCode();
854            result = prime * result + java.util.Objects.hash(name, mode);
855            return result;
856        }
857
858        @Override
859        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
860            if (this == obj) {
861                return true;
862            }
863            if (!super.equals(obj)) {
864                return false;
865            }
866            if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
867                return false;
868            }
869            ResourceModel other = (ResourceModel) obj;
870            return java.util.Objects.equals(name, other.name)
871                && mode == other.mode;
872        }
873
874        @Override
875        public String toString() {
876            StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(50);
877            builder.append("AccessModel [mode=").append(mode)
878                .append(", name=").append(name).append(']');
879            return builder.toString();
880        }
881
882    }
883}
